actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy

official_title: To provide for the withholding of contributions to certain organizations that assist Iraq, Iran, Libya, and Cuba.

summary.text: Requires the President to withhold assessed and voluntary contributions of the United States to any international financial institution that furnishes any assistance to Iraq, Iran, Libya, or Cuba.

titles.title: To provide for the withholding of contributions to certain organizations that assist Iraq, Iran, Libya, and Cuba.
